name: Into the Pit (Scougie)
description:
Made in 72 hours for MoonJam 2020 - Theme of Horror

Game is a bit easy - didn't have time to put in more of the mechanics that deal with your heartbeat. Broken AI took up too much time :)  

Description

You have been forcibly entered into an ancient dungeon to search of a holy artifact. Equipped with nothing but the clothes on your back, you must sneak your way past the vile spirits that roam these dark halls to find the keys that unlock the paths deeper into the pit.

Controls

WASD - Movement

Space Bar (hold) - Inventory (Hover Item and release spacebar to select item. Hovering nothing or x to deselect) 

Left Click - Use held item / Interact with highlighted tile 

Right Click - Throw held item
